item.title: Reply to 'Add a column to existing table and uniquely number them on MS SQL Server' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/108211/add-a-column-to-existing-table-and-uniquely-number-them-on-ms-sql-server:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to 'Add a column to existing table and uniquely number them on MS SQL Server' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/108211/add-a-column-to-existing-table-and-uniquely-number-them-on-ms-sql-server:

for oracle you could do something like below

alter table mytable add (myfield integer);

update mytable set myfield = rownum;
